H0.text: What is the name of the Lord played by Rik Mayall in the UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’. Lord Flashheart

H1.text: What is the name of the Lord played by Rik Mayall in the UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’. Lord Melchett

H2.text: What is the name of the Lord played by Rik Mayall in the UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’. General Sir Anthony Cecil Hogmanay Melchett

H3.text: What is the name of the Lord played by Rik Mayall in the UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’. Nursie

A4.text: Mayall returned to play Lord Flashheart in the Blackadder II episode titled 'Bells'. A descendant of this character, Squadron Commander Flashheart, was in the Blackadder Goes Forth episode 'Private Plane'.

A5.text: Mayall returned to play Lord Flashheart in the Blackadder II episode titled 'Bells'.
